user_review: This is definitely one of the little hidden gems in Montreal! It's weird that this is only the first review on Yelp. This place deserves to have more hype!I ordered some samosas with chicken aloo, chicken madrasi, and some naan. Â Everything was absolutely delicious. They are not afraid to spice up the food. The flavours are just impeccable. Every last drop of the sauces were devoured. I can't wait to try the rest of their menu!
